T04sanss18u:346: darśayi cetika te jinabimbā tena sudarśanaraśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanss18u:348: raśmi pramuñci prabhaṃkara nāmā yā prabha jihma karoti marūṇāṃ |
T04sanss18u:349: sarvarajaṃ ca tamaṃ ca hanitvā so prabha bhāsati lokahitānāṃ ||tāya
T04sanss18u:350: prabhāsaya codita satvās te jinapūjapradīpa dharentī |
T04sanss18u:351: te jinapūjapradīpa dharitvā lokapradīpakarā jina bhonti ||
T04sanss18u:352: tailapradīpa ghṛtasya pradīpā dāru tṛṇā naḍaveṇu pradīpān |
T04sanss18u:354: pramuñciya pratāraṇi nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:356: dūṣita saṃskṛta varṇita śāntī tena pratāraṇi raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanss18u:357: raśmi pipāsavinodani nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:365: prītikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:366: prītiphuṭā varabodhinidānaṃ cinta janenti bhaviṣya svayaṃbhū
T04sanss18u:368: bhāṣita buddhaguṇāḥ sada kālaṃ prītikarī prabha tena nivṛttā ||raśmi
T04sanss18u:369: pramuñci ratiṃkara nāmā tāya prabhāsaya bodhita satvā |
T04sanss18u:370: buddharatīrata dharmaratīrata saṃgharatīrata te sada bhonti
T04sanss18u:372: labdhanupattikakṣānti labhanti codita smārita ye bahu satvā ||
T04sanss18u:374: tena ratiṃkara raśmi nivṛttā ||puṇyasamuccayaraśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā
T04sanss18u:375: dānu dadanti vicitram anekaṃ prārthayamānu anuttaru bodhiṃ ||āśaya pūritu yācanakānāṃ yajña nirargaḍa tair yajamānaiḥ |
T04sanss18u:376: sarvabhiprāyata dānu daditvā puṇyasamuccaya raśmi nivṛttā ||jñānavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:377: eka tu dharma mukhātu anekā dharmamukhān avabuddhi kṣaṇena ||
T04sanss18u:379: dharmaprabheda ... grāhita satvān arthaviniścaya jñāna vibhaktī |
T04sanss18u:381: dharmapadârthavibhāṣaṇa kṛtvā jñānavatī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
T04sanss18u:382: prajñapradīpayâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:385: dharmâsvāmika śūnya nirīhān bhāṣati prajñapradīpa nivṛttā
T04sanss18u:386: ||dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā |
T04sanss18u:389: dharmânugraha kṛtva jagasya dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanss18u:390: tyāgavatī yada raśmi vimuñcī tāya ya matsara codita satvā |
T04sanss18u:393: bṛṃhita tyāga prasannam anena tyāgavatīprabha tena nivṛttā ||niṣparidāha
T04sanss18u:394: yâusari raśmiḥ tāya duḥśīlaya codita satvā |
T04sanss18u:395: śīlaviśuddhi pratiṣṭhita bhūtvā cinta janenti bhaveya svayaṃbhūḥ ||
T04sanss18u:397: karmapathe kuśale pariśuddhe śīla samādayi yad bahusatvān |
T04sanss18u:398: bodhayi citta samādayanena raśmi nivṛtta sa niṣparidāhaḥ ||
T04sanss18u:400: kṣāntiviyūha yâusari raśmi tāya yâkṣama codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:401: krodhakhilaṃ adhimāna jahitvā kṣāntiratīrata te sada bhonti ||duḥkṛta
T04sanss18u:403: varṇita kṣāntiguṇāḥ sadakālaṃ tena nivṛtta sa kṣāntiviyūhā ||raśmi
T04sanss18u:404: uttaptavatī yada muñcī tāya kuśīdaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:405: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karonti akhinnaprayogāḥ ||
T04sanss18u:406: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karitvâkhinnaprayogāḥ |
T04sanss18u:407: te catu mārapathâtikrāntāḥ kṣipra spṛśanti anuttara bodhiṃ ||
T04sanss18u:408: vīrya samādayi yad bahusatvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu |
T04sanss18u:409: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tenôtaptavatī prabha labdhā ||śāntikarī
T04sanss18u:410: yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrāntaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:411: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhita cittāḥ ||pāpa
T04sanss18u:412: kumitra kiliṣṭa carīye saṃgaṇikāvinivartana kṛtvā |varṇita dhyāna praśāntâraṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā ||prajñaviyūha yâusari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:413: satyapratītya vimokṣanaye 'smin nidriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti ||
T04sanss18u:418: karā jina bhonti ||rājyadhanâtmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānaṃ |
T04sanss18u:419: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ
T04sanss18u:420: ||buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:423: buddhabalâviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā ||te
T04sanss18u:426: ye 'bhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇibadhāt tu nivārita bhonti |
T04sanss18u:427: trāyita yaccharaṇâgata bhītās tena bhayaṃdada raśmi nivṛttā
T04sanss18u:429: sarvata vyādhidukhāt pratimuktā dhyānasamādhisukhāni labhanti ||rogavinodani mūla phaloṣadha ratna rasāyana gandhanulepān |
T04sanss18u:430: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā ||
T04sanss18u:432: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sacoditâyu kṣayānte |
T04sanss18u:433: buddhânusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sabuddhakkṣetraṃ ||kāla
T04sanss18u:437: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇânte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā
T04sanss18u:438: ||dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā |
T04sanss18u:439: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti
T04sanss18u:441: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā
T04sanss18u:443: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti ||ucca svareṇa stavanti maharṣīn tūryamahattaraghaṇṭapradānaiḥ |
T04sanss18u:445: 'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:446: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ
T04sanss18u:449: viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:454: ya stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā ||ratnaviyūha
T04sanss18u:455: yâusari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:456: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn ||
T04sanss18u:457: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ |
T04sanss18u:458: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratnaviyūhāḥ
T04sanss18u:459: ||gandhaprabhāsa yâusari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanss18u:460: ghrātvâmānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti
T04sanss18u:467: prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalôpama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ |
T04sanss18u:468: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā ||muñcati
T04sanss18u:469: meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ |
T04sanss18u:473: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagnâcela subhūṣaṇa bhontī |
T04sanss18u:476: raśmi rasâgravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasâgra labhantī |
T04sanss18u:477: bhojana pāna vicitra rasâgrān datva rasâgravatī prabha labdhā ||arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ |
T04sanss18u:478: akṣayaratnanidhiṃ tribhi ratnair dānatârthanidarśani labdhā ||cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram |
T04sanss18u:479: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||śrotraviśodhani
T04sanss18u:483: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā
T04sanss18u:485: vāca durukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇôdīrita raśmi nivṛttā ||kāyaviśodhani
T04sanss18u:487: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhvā ||citta-
T04sanss18u:489: viśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacita bhavanti |
T04sanss18u:490: citta samādhivaśânuga kṛtvā cittaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||rūpaviśodhani
T04sanss18u:493: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabdâśabdata śūnya vijānī |
T04sanss18u:494: pratyaya jāta pratiśrutatulyaṃ śabdaprakāśana raśmi nivṛttā
T04sanss18u:495: ||gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī |
T04sanss18u:498: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasâgrāḥ |
T04sanss18u:499: buddha saśrāvakamātṛpit-rṇāṃ sarvarasâgrapradāna prabhâiṣāṃ ||sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī |
T04sanss18u:500: śaktitriśūlâsi [[DOUBT]] tomaravarṣā mālya mṛdū padumôtpala bhontī
T04sanss18u:501: ||duṣyâneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ |
T04sanss18u:504: muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān |
T04sanss18u:507: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā ||raśmi
T04sanss18u:509: niścari gaṅgarajôpama raśmī sarvapṛthagvidhakarmaprayogāḥ ||te yathâikata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajôpama raśmī |
T04sanss18u:510: evam aśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhivikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ ||yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve |
T04sanss18u:511: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇâiṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ ||teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ |
T04sanss18u:512: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhôpacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ ||ye ca
T04sanss18u:513: śubhôpacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ |
T04sanss18u:514: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ ||
T04sanss18u:516: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī nô ca sa nâsti udeti sa loke |
T04sanss18u:520: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī |
T04sanss18u:521: mithyahatâdhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te côdāramatīnāṃ ||ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ |
T04sanss18u:522: te pi tu asti mahâtmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānāṃ ||evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī |
T04sanss18u:525: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nâṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ ||te
T04sanss18u:531: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī ||ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpa-dita buddhaguṇeṣu |
T04sanss18u:532: te parivāri ataṃ mahapadmaṃ sarvôdikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ ||
T04sanss18u:537: yauvanavegasthiteṣu samāhita vyutthihi jīrṇaka vṛddha śarīrāḥ |
T04sanss18u:540: bhikṣuṇikāya śarīri samāhita vyutthihi bhikṣubahuśrutakāyāḥ ||bhikṣubahuśrutakāya samāhita vyutthihi śaikṣâśaikṣaśarīrāḥ |
T04sanss18u:543: buddhavarâgraśarīri samāhita vyutthihi devatakāya śarīrā ||devatakāyaśarīri samāhita vyutthihi nāgamaharddhikakāyāḥ |
T04sanss18u:547: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu |
T04sanss18u:548: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ ||ekatu
T04sanss18u:550: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramâṇurajātaḥ ||ekarajasmi
T04sanss18u:557: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānāṃ
T04sanss18u:561: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalānu mahâtmā ||
T04sanss18u:562: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt |
T04sanss18u:563: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita vyutthihi te gaganânusmṛtîmān ||eti samādhi vimokṣâcintyās teṣâcintyaguṇôpacitānāṃ
T04sanss18u:564: kalpâcintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum ||sarvajinebhi
T04sanss18u:566: nāgavikurvita buddhavikurvā dhyāyina dhyānâcintya vikurvā ||te ca vaśe sthitâṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvakâika bhavībahu bhontī |
T04sanss18u:567: bhūtva bahuḥ punâika bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin ||te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhi anarthiku lokôpekṣī |
T04sanss18u:568: darśayi kāyavikurvâcintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitâiṣī ||candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsaṃ |
T04sanss18u:573: evam acintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ |
T04sanss18u:576: teṣu svarâṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena ||sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣa vidhijñā |
T04sanss18u:577: dhāraṇidharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam ||māyakaro
T04sanss18u:579: rātridivâikamuhūrtuku māsān varṣaśataṃ puna sphītapradīptān ||māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokaṃ |
T04sanss18u:580: dhyānâbhijña vimokṣasuśikṣita kasya na toṣayi caryavidhijñaḥ ||rāhu
T04sanss18u:581: yathêṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade talabandhaṃ |
T04sanss18u:582: darśana sāgaru nābhipramāṇaṃ bhoti sumerutale sama śīrṣaḥ ||so 'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayîdṛśa ṛddhī |
T04sanss18u:583: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi anantā ||paśyâcintiya
T04sanss18u:585: yātuka bimbaranekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmaṇi śakru svakāyān ||
T04sanss18u:587: sarvasurêndrasurāś ca vijānī śakrama ... purato gata svâyum |eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurêndrāḥ ||netra sahasra bhayaṅkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītaṃ varmita kāya durāsada teja śakram udīkṣya palātv asurêndrāḥ || so hitêtvarapuṇyabalenā śakra vikurvati devajayârthī |
T04sanss18u:588: sarvajagasyâśeṣata trāṇāṃ akṣayapuṇya kuto na vikurvī || ...
T04sanss18u:589: vāyuta saṃbhuta meghapravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī |
T04sanss18u:590: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhâvaha sarvajagasya ||
T04sanss18u:591: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyuḥ |
T04sanss18u:592: darśayi lokavipākâcintyā kasya na darśayi te varalabdhā ||
